page.title: 15MALVERN GAZETTE
page.content: On 17/6/85 3 pupils from Malven Link Junior School intervewed the editor of the local paper which started in 1855. She edits two papers,The Malvern Gazette and The Ledbury Reporter, contained in one leaflet.Most articles of the paper are on local events some articles are for children.She recieves 15-20 letters per week on articles that are written in the paper.To finace the paper advertisement is as essential as the price the public pays for the paper.We asked if it was unusual to have a female editor but she told us that if you can do the job it does not matter.She employs 16 staff.The newspaper is printed approximately 8 miles away from where it is actually written.
